name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：材料力學
本課程要求學生具備材料力學的基礎知識。課程中將會要求同學上台以英語進行解題練習。如果對基礎材料力學不熟悉，請務必仔細考慮，並在家中充分複習後再選修本課程。

主要涵蓋的主題包括：

複合材料元件介紹（C401）
複合材料特性分析（C402）
複合材料力學行為（C403）
單向性複合材料勁度（C404）
應力與應變轉換（C405）
非軸向單向性複合材料勁度（C406）
疲勞破壞（C407）
複合材料於鐵路系統之應用（C408）
鐵道輕量化與複合材料（C409）
Prerequisite: Mechanics of Materials
This course requires a solid foundation in Mechanics of Materials. Students will be expected to practice problem-solving in English during class presentations. If you are unfamiliar with basic Mechanics of Materials, please carefully consider enrolling and ensure you review the material thoroughly before taking this course.

Key topics covered:

Introduction to Composite Material Components (C401)
Analysis of Composite Material Properties (C402)
Mechanical Behavior of Composite Materials (C403)
Stiffness of Unidirectional Composite Materials (C404)
Stress and Strain Transformation (C405)
Stiffness of Off-Axis Unidirectional Composite Materials (C406)
Fatigue Failure (C407)
Application of Composite Materials in Railway Systems (C408)
Lightweight Railway Design with Composites (C409)
schedule:
Week 1-2:
Introduction to Composite Material Components
複合材料元件介紹
Learn about the fundamental components and structure of composite materials.
學習複合材料的基本單元與結構。
Competency Indicator: C401
能力指標: C401

Week 3-4:
Analysis of Composite Material Properties
複合材料特性分析
Analyze the physical and mechanical properties of composite materials and their applications.
分析複合材料的物理與機械特性，探討其應用。
Competency Indicator: C402
能力指標: C402

Week 5-6:
Mechanical Behavior of Composite Materials
複合材料力學行為
Explore the mechanical behavior of composite materials under different stress and strain conditions.
探討複合材料在不同應力與應變條件下的力學行為。
Competency Indicator: C403
能力指標: C403

Week 7-8:
Stiffness of Unidirectional Composite Materials
單向性複合材料勁度
Learn how to calculate the stiffness of unidirectional composite materials and its applications.
學習單向性複合材料的勁度計算及其應用。
Competency Indicator: C404
能力指標: C404

Week 9:
Midterm Exam
期中考試
Assess students’ understanding and application of concepts covered in the first half of the course.
測試學生前半部分課程中的理解與應用能力。

Week 10:
Stress and Strain Transformation
應力與應變轉換
Study the transformation equations between stress and strain and their applications in composites.
學習應力與應變之間的轉換方程式及應用。
Competency Indicator: C405
能力指標: C405

Week 11:
Stiffness of Off-Axis Unidirectional Composite Materials
非軸向單向性複合材料勁度
Examine the mechanical properties and applications of off-axis unidirectional composite materials.
探討非軸向單向性複合材料的力學特性及其應用。
Competency Indicator: C406
能力指標: C406

Week 12:
Fatigue Failure
疲勞破壞
Understand the fatigue behavior and failure mechanisms of composite materials, and how to prolong material life.
了解複合材料的疲勞行為及其破壞機制，並學習如何延長材料壽命。
Competency Indicator: C407
能力指標: C407

Week 13-14:
Applications of Composite Materials in Railway Systems
複合材料於鐵路系統之應用
Explore the use of composite materials in railway systems, including vehicle structures and railway infrastructure.
探討複合材料在鐵道系統中的應用，包含車輛結構及鐵路基礎設施的具體案例。
Competency Indicator: C408
能力指標: C408

Week 15-16:
Lightweight Railway Design with Composites
鐵道輕量化與複合材料
Learn how composite materials can be used to achieve lightweight design in railway systems, improving energy efficiency and performance.
學習如何利用複合材料實現鐵道系統的輕量化設計，提升能源效率和性能。
Competency Indicator: C409
能力指標: C409

Week 17:
Final Review and Application Exercises
期末複習與應用練習
Comprehensive review of course content, with practical problem-solving exercises.
綜合複習課程內容，並進行實際問題應用練習。

Week 18:
Final Exam
期末考試
Test students' overall understanding and ability to apply the course content.
測試學生對整個課程內容的綜合掌握與應用能力。
scorePolicy:
Week 2 Mechanics of Materials Review Test - 10%

This assessment evaluates students' understanding of fundamental concepts in mechanics of materials.
Full English Oral Presentation - 30%

Students will prepare and deliver an oral presentation in English, with a focus on assessing their communication skills and comprehension of the course material.
Homework - 15%

Students are required to complete homework assignments, which are intended to reinforce classroom learning and apply concepts to practical problems.
Midterm Exam - 15%

The midterm exam assesses students' grasp of key concepts covered in the first half of the course.
Final Exam - 20%

The final exam provides a comprehensive assessment of the knowledge acquired throughout the semester.

Assessment Rubrics
Basic Concepts of Mechanics of Materials

Competency Indicators: A101, A102, A103, A104, A105
Assessment Method: Semester Performance
Needs Improvement (0-59): Students show insufficient understanding of basic concepts and are unable to apply them.
Satisfactory (60-79): Students have a basic understanding of core concepts but with limited application.
Good (80-89): Students demonstrate a good understanding and application of core concepts.
Excellent (90-100): Students have mastered the core concepts and can apply them flexibly.
Integration of Railway Engineering Content

Competency Indicators: A106, A107
Assessment Method: Classroom Exam
Needs Improvement (0-59): Students have a weak understanding of railway-related concepts.
Satisfactory (60-79): Students have a basic understanding of railway-related concepts.
Good (80-89): Students show a good understanding and application of railway concepts.
Excellent (90-100): Students have a deep understanding and can apply railway concepts in real-world scenarios.
Prerequisite Knowledge in Statics and Dynamics

Competency Indicators: A108, A109
Assessment Method: Classroom Exam
Needs Improvement (0-59): Students are unable to grasp the basic knowledge of statics and dynamics.
Satisfactory (60-79): Students demonstrate basic proficiency in statics and dynamics.
Good (80-89): Students have a good grasp of concepts and problem-solving abilities.
Excellent (90-100): Students have mastered statics and dynamics and can analyze complex issues effectively.

第二週材料力學複習考試 - 10%
此項評量用於評估學生對材料力學基礎概念的掌握情況。

全英文課堂報告 - 30%
學生將準備並進行全英文口頭報告，重點評估其表達能力與對課程內容的理解。

回家作業 - 15%
學生需完成課後作業，鞏固課堂上學到的知識並應用於實際問題。

期中考試 - 15%
期中考試將評估學生在前半部分課程中對關鍵概念的掌握程度。

期末考試 - 20%
期末考試綜合評估學生在整個學期內所學知識的掌握情況。

評量尺標
材料力學基礎概念

能力指標: A101, A102, A103, A104, A105
評量方式：學期成績
待加強 (0-59): 學生對基礎概念理解不足，無法應用。
普通 (60-79): 學生基本理解核心概念，但應用有限。
優良 (80-89): 學生能較好地理解並應用核心概念。
精熟 (90-100): 學生精通核心概念，能夠靈活應用。
鐵道工程內容的融合

能力指標: A106, A107
評量方式：課堂考試
待加強 (0-59): 學生對鐵道相關概念理解薄弱。
普通 (60-79): 學生基本理解鐵道相關概念。
優良 (80-89): 學生能較好理解並應用鐵道概念。
精熟 (90-100): 學生對鐵道概念有深入理解，並能應用於實際情境。
靜力學與動力學的先備知識

能力指標: A108, A109
評量方式：課堂考試
待加強 (0-59): 學生無法掌握靜力學與動力學的基礎知識。
普通 (60-79): 學生基本掌握靜力學與動力學的基礎知識。
優良 (80-89): 學生能較好掌握這些概念並解決相關問題。
精熟 (90-100): 學生精通靜力學與動力學，能夠分析複雜問題。

Cook, R.D. and Young, W.C., Advanced Mechanics of Materials, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1999.
